name.baseName: Natural gas liquefaction; Coke oven gas ;Decarburization process
天然气液化 ;焦炉煤气; 脱碳工艺

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Using coke oven gas (COG) to produce liquefied natural gas (LNG) is a promising choice to partially alleviate the shortage of natural gas supply and effectively utilize the by-products of coking production in China. In order to systematically evaluate the energy consumption and environmental impact of LNG process based on COG,
利用焦炉煤气（COG）生产液化天然气 （LNG）是部分缓解天然气供应短缺和有效利用中国炼焦生产副产品的有前途的选择。为了系统评价基于COG的LNG工艺的能耗和环境影响，

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: A representative coking plant in China

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: This study involves four LNG production processes, as follows: 1) COG-based decarburization process for LNG production ("decarburization process"), 2) COG-based LNG production with hydrogen-free extraction methanation process ("methanation process"), 3) COG-based LNG extraction by methanation process and hydrogen extraction ("H for methanation process") 2), and 4) domestic NG direct liquefaction process ("domestic NG liquefaction")
该研究涉及四种LNG生产工艺，具体如下：1）基于COG的脱碳工艺生产LNG（简称“脱碳工艺”），2）基于COG的LNG生产，采用无氢萃取的甲烷化工艺（简称“甲烷化工艺”），3）基于COG的LNG通过甲烷化工艺和氢气提取（简称“甲烷化工艺用H”）2萃取“），以及4）国产NG直接液化工艺（简称”国产NG液化“）
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described technology pertains to the production of liquefied natural gas (LNG) from coke oven gas (COG), which is a useful approach for supplementing natural gas supply and utilizing by-products of coking processes in China. The technology can be incorporated in industrial applications where natural gas shortages are prevalent and in coking plants aiming to optimize the use of generated COG. The LNG production techniques mentioned include COG-based decarburization, hydrogen-free extraction methanation, methanation with hydrogen extraction, and domestic natural gas direct liquefaction processes.
该技术涉及从焦炉煤气（COG）生产液化天然气（LNG），这是补充天然气供应和利用中国炼焦过程副产品的有效方法。这项技术可以在天然气短缺普遍的工业应用中并入，以及在旨在优化生成COG使用的炼焦工厂中。提到的LNG生产技术包括基于COG的脱碳工艺、无氢萃取的甲烷化工艺、带氢气提取的甲烷化以及国内天然气直接液化过程。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: This study is based on gear-based LNG production based on decarburization process, because the field data of a representative coking plant in China are sufficient.
本研究以基于脱碳工艺的齿轮基LNG生产为基准，因为中国某代表性焦化厂的现场数据充足。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: The functional unit is defined as 1 Nm3 to supply natural gas to users. The system scope consists of six life cycle stages: coal mining and processing, coal transportation, coking production, LNG production, LNG transportation and LNG evaporation
功能单元定义为 1 Nm3向用户供应天然气。系统范围由六个生命周期阶段组成：煤炭开采和加工、煤炭运输、炼焦生产、LNG生产、LNG运输和LNG蒸发

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Li, J. et al. Life cycle assessment of liquefied natural gas production from coke oven gas in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 329, 129609 (2021).
Li, J. et al. Life cycle assessment of liquefied natural gas production from coke oven gas in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 329, 129609 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: The study provides essential data on the energy and environmental impacts of various LNG production processes based on coke oven gas (COG). Users should take into account the comprehensive life cycle stages from coal mining to LNG evaporation in their assessments. The reference process in this study, which is the gear-based LNG production from decarburization, should be specifically considered when the field data from a representative coking plant in China is relevant. Additionally, the choice of the production process may affect the scope and results of the LCA, hence must be selected judiciously based on target application and geographical context.
该研究提供了基于焦炉煤气（COG）的各种LNG生产工艺的能源和环境影响的基本数据。用户应在评估中考虑从煤炭开采到LNG蒸发的综合生命周期阶段。在中国某代表性炼焦厂的现场数据相关时，应特别考虑该研究的参考工艺，即基于脱碳工艺的齿轮基LNG生产。此外，生产工艺的选择可能会影响LCA的范围和结果，因此必须根据目标应用和地理环境审慎选择。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The original text did not distinguish between Bio and Fossil. According to experts, this is Fossil. The output of coke.
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为fossil。焦炭产出量。
The original text did not distinguish between Bio and Fossil. According to experts, this is Fossil. The output of tar oil.
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为fossil。焦煤油产出量。
